entry.title: OAG Group of Companies Vacancies Training Executive

link.title: OAG Group of Companies Vacancies Training Executive

entry.content:
OAG Group of Companies is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Training Executive position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Job Requirements
  • Candidate must posses at least Bachelor Degree in any field.
  • Possess interpersonal skills that enable you to work with people at all levels, motivate others and change people's attitudes when necessary.
  • Good written and spoken communication skills that allow you to inform and advise others clearly.
  • Possess problem-solving and negotiation skills.
  • Able to have own initiative and the ability to offer new ideas.
  • Must have organisational and planning skills to manage time and to meet deadlines and objectives.
  • Good time-keeping skills to enable you to effectively manage training schedules.
  • Personal commitment to improving your own knowledge and skills.
  • Good MS Office skills particularly in Excel, Words and Power point.
  • Able to work independently and meticulous.
  • Must be willing to travel to Pulau Indah, Port Klang.
Job Responsibilities
  • Assist with external course registration.
  • Inform target audience of upcoming training programs and collect data on participation interest.
  • Plan and coordinate in-house training programs.
  • Plan and organize orientation programs for new staff.
  • Prepare training activities reports for management review.
  • Support team with all other administration relating to training and development.
  • Tabulate training feedback findings and generate training evaluation reports.
  • Track all training activities and training hours clocked by employees.
  • Conduct annual training needs analysis
  • Supports in developing a strategic plan to implement an efficient and responsive training services and relevant programs.
  • Assist training team in conducting all training activities.
  • Conducting job evaluation surveys.
  • Liaising with managers and interviewing employees at all levels to identify and assess training and development needs.

Company Overview

OAG is an established oil and gas company with many divisions that cater to a broad range of services of the industry. Based in Shah Alam headquarters but conducts our business in the region of Asia Pacific, we now invite dedicated and dynamic individuals to join us for our expansion. The company offers a long term career opportunity to the right candidate to grow with us while we are expanding further to new markets.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Selangor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: OAG Group of Companies is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Training Executive which positioned at Selangor

entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Assistant Teacher cum Daycare

link.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Assistant Teacher cum Daycare

entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Assistant Teacher cum Daycare position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Islamic Junior Cambridge
Job Description
  • Passionate and enthusiastic in teaching
  • Love children & creative
  • Committed towards giving the best to the little ones
  • Teach alphabet and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills
  • Use a variety of activities and instructional methods (songs, stories, media, structured games, art, outdoor activities etc) to motivate and stimulate children’s abilities
  • Maintain an open line of communication with parents and provide appropriate information
  • To help with the daycare
Job Requirements:
  • Candidate must possess at least a Professional Certificate, Diploma, Degree of Early Childhood Education or equivalent.
  • Required language(s): English, Bahasa Melayu
  • At least 1 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Applicants must be willing to work in Shah Alam (Bukit Jelutong)
  • Must possess own CAR.
  • Accommodation is provided for single teacher
  • Salary range : MYR1300 ~ MYR1700

Company Overview

Who are we?
Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
Your application will be redirected to them.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Selangor.
Apply Online

entry.title: Malaysian Association for the Blind Vacancies Audio Production Instructor

link.title: Malaysian Association for the Blind Vacancies Audio Production Instructor

entry.content:
Malaysian Association for the Blind is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Audio Production Instructor position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

  • Candidate must possess at least Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma in Music/Performing Arts Studies or equivalent.
  • At least 2 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Preferably Non-Executive specialized in Others/Category not available or equivalent.
  • Preference is given to those familiar with Persijilan Kemahiran Malaysia
  • An advantage for those with VTO (Vocational Trainer Officer)
  • Responsibilities:-
  • 1) to teach and supervise trainess
  • 2) develop, review and update all learning materials in compliance with the syllabus and curiculum
  • 3) participate in the development, administration and marking of exams and other assessment.
  • 4) provide academic counselling and pastoral care to all trainees
  • Requirement:-
  • 1) strong commitment and passionate in teaching and courage to help visually impaired trainees of different background achieving their dreams
  • 2) pro- active and self-motivated, with the ability to work independently as well as participate within the team.

Company Overview

Malaysian Association for The Blind (MAB) is the leading non-govermental organization (NGO) for the visually impaired person in Malaysia. Established in 1951, it works toward greater integration of the blind into society. Thus, it activities cover areas like rehabilitation, education, vocational training, employment, fundraising, sports and recreation and generally the welfare of the blind.
 

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Kuala Lumpur.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Malaysian Association for the Blind is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Audio Production Instructor which positioned at Kuala Lumpur

entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Centre Principal (Preschool)
entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Centre Principal (Preschool) position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Kidz Treehouse (Malaysia)
Kidz Treehouse is expanding to Malaysia and we are looking for passionate educators with fervent belief of nature as a teaching pedagogy. Be part of our team to bring meaningful learning experiences to create a better future, a better world for our children.
Job Description
  • Provide leadership to teachers to ensure quality and standards in early childhood curriculum design, development and implementation of teaching.
  • Coach and support teachers to monitor, assess, document, evaluate children’s learning and development.
  • Develop strategies to market and maintain the school’s student enrolment to maximise school’s capacity.
  • Manage cost control in all aspects of school operations.
  • Coach and mentor teachers to foster and maintain professional working relationships with the school’s stakeholders for the performance growth of students under their care.
  • Ensure Standard Operating Procedures by the Ministry and the organization are well adhered to (including physical environment).
  • Ensure and maintain positive relationships with parents through smooth and effective communication strategies.
  • Plan the academic year calendar outlining significant events to support cultural, festive and national events.
  • Organise events that promote the school’s vision and missions.
  • Develop the curriculum in relevance to the national framework (if need be) in accordance with the organization’s teaching philosophy.
Job Requirements
  • Minimum Bachelor’s Degree in Early Childhood Education from an approved institution or equivalent
  • At least 5 years working experience in a preschool setting with at least 3 years in a managerial role
  • Exemplary leadership and management skills are essential
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Preferably Forest School Leader (FSL) certified/trained
  • Residing in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia or willing to be relocated

Company Overview

Who are we?
Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
Your application will be redirected to them.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Selangor.

entry.content:
Malaysian Association for the Blind is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Computer System Instructor position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

  • Candidate must possess at least Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma in Others or equivalent.
  • Required language(s): English, Bahasa Malaysia
  • At least 2 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Required Skill(s): Minimum have SKM Level 3, keen to teach blind trainees, good communication skills,
  • Preferably Non-Executive specialized in Training & Development or equivalent.
  • Responsibilities:-
  • 1) develop course material and evaluation tools per JPK standard format.
  • 2) evaluate trainees progress and maintain records
  • 3) prepare individualised training plan for each trainees
  • 4) prepare progress report for aech trainees at the end of semester.
  • 5) keep stack of training materilas/ equipment
  • 6) escort trainees for outing/ fields trip
  • 7) perform any other duties as directed by the Manager of GTC from time to time. 

Company Overview

Malaysian Association for The Blind (MAB) is the leading non-govermental organization (NGO) for the visually impaired person in Malaysia. Established in 1951, it works toward greater integration of the blind into society. Thus, it activities cover areas like rehabilitation, education, vocational training, employment, fundraising, sports and recreation and generally the welfare of the blind.

entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies E-learning Freelancers
entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for E-learning Freelancers position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Vschool Trend
  • Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree
  • Product: E-learning program for students(STD1 - F5) 100% according to Malaysia syllabus.
  • Can work from home
  • Flexible working time
  • No working experience needed
  • Basic understanding of Mandarin is needed will be added advantage (Malaysian only)
Due to the pandemic, the demand of online education is very high. So we require much more people to develop the market together!??
If you are interested in earning extra income or looking for Plan B, PM the link below for more details.

entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Early Childhood Education Assessing Officer

link.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Early Childhood Education Assessing Officer

entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Early Childhood Education Assessing Officer position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Geomatika University College
  • Mengendalikan dan menyediakan latihan termasuk menyediakan pelan mengajar, kertas penerangan, kertas kerja, kertas tugas dan alat-alat bantuan mengajar serta memastikan pencapaian kemahiran oleh pelatih-pelatih, mengajar dalam amali dan teori.
  • Wajib mengikuti kursus pembangunan bahan pengajaran dan pembelajaran dan membangunkannya di pusat dari semasa ke semasa.
  • Mengawas pelatih semasa di bengkel seperti dari segi kebersihan, keselamatan dalam penggunaan alat-alat dan perkakas serta berdisiplin semasa latihan.
  • Menyelenggara keperluan bahan-bahan ujian.
  • Menyelia dan mengurus semua ujian-ujian dan menyelia laporan-laporan kemajuan dan ujian-ujian pelatih.
  • Menyelia semua hal ehwal latihan yang berkenaan dengan ketukangan termasuk keselamatan bengkel, kebersihan dan kerosakannya.
  • Bertanggungjawab di atas penyediaan inventori dan keluar masuk bagi semua barang-barang di bawah kawalan.
  • Merancang penyusunan mesin-mesin dan alat-alat perkakasan di bahagian-bahagian di bawah jagaannya.
  • Mengesyor pembelian alat-alat baru supaya mutu latihan dikemaskini.
  • Merancang pembahagian tugas-tugas dan jadual minggu mengikut program latihan pelatih di kalangan pengajar di bawah penyeliaannya.
  • Merancang dan membuat permohonan bekalan bahan-bahan di bengkel berdasarkan latihan dan mengemukakan kepada Ketua Bahagian.
  • Menjalankan tugas-tugas lain yang diarahkan dari semasa ke semasa
  • Menjalankan usaha-usaha berbentuk penyelidikan dan pembangunan latihan vokasional sejajar dengan keperluan industri.
  • Menyediakan jadual latihan tahunan, keperluan latihan termasuk pembahagian "work load"
  • Menguruskan pelaksanaan program latihan dan persediaan perisian latihan.
  • Mengurus, menyelia dan mengawal kegunaan peralatan, bahan-bahan bengkel serta makmal latihan.
  • Mengendalikan kursus-kursus mengikut keperluan-keperluan sukatan dan piawaian latihan serta bertanggungjawab ke atas kualiti dan keberkesanan kursus yang dikendalikan.
  • Bertanggungjawab dalam membuat promosi, merancang dan menjalankan, menilai pencapaian kursus-kursus jangka pendek yang dijalankan di institusi berkenaan.
  • Membantu dalam menilai dan memperbaiki kursus-kursus latihan dari segi kelicinan dan keberkesanan.
  • Menyertai aktiviti-aktiviti pentadbiran/pengurusan Pusat Institusi Jabatan.
  • Membuat perhubungan dengan industri untuk mendapatkan tempat yang sesuai untuk pelatih-pelatih menjalani aktiviti dalam logi.
  • Merancang dan melaksanakan jadual lawatan susulan latihan dalam logi untuk pengajar-pengajar dan memeriksa laporan pegawai susulan untuk menilai keberkesanan program tersebut.
  • Menyempurnakan tugas-tugas lain dan tanggungjawab yang diarahkan oleh Pengarah dan Ketua Jabatan dari semasa ke semasa.
  • Menyelaraskan perhubungan di antara jabatan-jabatan/ketukangan-ketukangan khususnya yang berkaitan dengan keperluan latihan dan kemudahan bahan mengajar.
Job Requirements
  • Sijil Induksi PPB-PPD-PP2 Vocational Training Officer3 SKM Tahap 3 Pendidikan Awal Kanak24 sijil KAP (Kursus Asuhan Permata)

Company Overview

Who are we?
Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
Your application will be redirected to them.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Kuala Lumpur.

entry.title: IMU Education Sdn Bhd Vacancies Executive, Student Services

link.title: IMU Education Sdn Bhd Vacancies Executive, Student Services

entry.content:
IMU Education Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Executive, Student Services position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Job Responsibilities:
FINANCIAL SUPPORT
  • To be the main contact person for all tasks pertaining to PTPTN.
  • To update database on relevant information pertaining to financial support.
  • To ensure relevant reports are prepared on time, submitted to the relevant department/committee including external bodies on time.
  • To monitor student results and analyse trend and suggest new way forward in managing issues.
  • To source for new financial support sponsors.
  • To submit results to sponsors on time.
PROGRAM DEVELOPMENT
  • Develop programs to engage with sponsored students, working closely with the sponsor bodies.
  • Develop mechanisms to assess the effectiveness of financial efforts and identify new initiatives to support the program going forward.
  • To contribute in the budget preparation.
  • Tailor the financial support programmes to the available resources and monitor expenses against that budget.
COMMUNICATIONS
  • Develop and execute the internal and external communications plan relevant to financial support.
  • To constantly be in touch with stakeholders mainly students and parents and provide timely, accurate and up-to-date information pertaining to financial support.
  • To manage financial wall and ensure news are up-to-date.
  • To ensure a regular engagement with sponsors are arranged.
OTHERS
  • Organize and support activities for sponsored students.
  • Sharing information with new students during orientation.
  • Prepare relevant reports.
  • To support events organized by the University.
  • To assist in Student Services Department projects management tasks
Job Requirements:
  • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Others or equivalent.
  • At least 3 years of working experience in the related field is required for this position or relevant.
  • Proficient in Microsoft Office applications.
  • Able to work with minimum supervision and deal with people of all levels.
  • Good interpersonal and communication skills
  • Excellent English language skills - both written and spoken

Company Overview

The International Medical University (IMU) is Malaysia’s first and most established private medical and healthcare university with 27 years of dedicated focus in healthcare education. Established in 1992, the University enjoys an international reputation, and provides a high standard of education at undergraduate, postgraduate and continuing professional development level. Its programmes consist of both local tracks (IMU degree), as well as international partner tracks (partner university degree). 
Product & Services
Medical education and Pharmacy programme

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Kuala Lumpur.
Apply Online
entry.summary: IMU Education Sdn Bhd is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Executive, Student Services which positioned at Kuala Lumpur

entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Faculty Dean
entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Faculty Dean position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Geomatika University College
TO LEAD
  • To lead the Faculty to achieve its goal and outcome stated by the University
  • To lead the team to become cohesive and can work well to serve the purpose. Important information is clearly disseminate
  • To lead and coach the team to be competent, to prepare the talent pool and responsible in the development of each personnel in the team
  • To lead any events or academic related activities (audit, accreditation etc)
  • To lead and deliver the vision and mission of the University clearly to subordinates and ensure good communication and relation between Faculty, team members and students to represent University as a whole.
TO MONITOR
  • To monitor the overall operation (the manpower, resources, quality, procedures and other related) of the Faculty the meet the requirements (internal and external audit) and the overall goals.
  • To monitor students welfare and engagement throughout their studies with the Faculty.
  • To monitor the internal training system in the Faculty to achieve competency
  • To monitor necessary activities for academic programs syllabus and delivery refinement is done by Head of Programs
TO CONDUCT
  • To conduct performance review, give constructive feedback to the team members for improvement.
  • To conduct alignment/Faculty meeting to ensure overall staff/team members engagement
  • To conduct and do activities to gain input from the market and industries demand for programs improvement and development.
  • To conduct necessary activities for academic programs syllabus and delivery refinement.
  • To conduct activities for students to support academic deliveries and students participation/engagement
  • To conduct activities that meet the requirement and target given to the Faculty (such as no of students etc)
TO DEVELOP & PLAN
  • To develop networking in between important stakeholders such as industries players and technical advisors. The networking must serve the purpose towards the excellent achievement of the Faculty overall.
  • To develop networking with potential students feeder institution or related to support academic purposes and future enrolment.
  • To plan and develop yearly plan for the Faculty based on the University overall goals including the development of new programs
  • To plan and develop Faculty/Departmental Performance goals to become individual performance contract (IPC/Individual KPI) for every team members.
TO ENSURE & COORDINATE
  • To ensure the no of students and resources are optimum in the Faculty
  • The service given by the Faculty towards students and other stakeholders are excellent
  • To ensure staff discipline and related. To coach the team for leadership and competency training.
  • To ensure all academic programs are on license to be offered. This include the accreditation process, renewal and related
  • To ensure Faculty’s goals are achieved to support the overall organization goals, mission and vision.
Job Requirements:
  • Candidate must have at least 5 years of working experience in the education line.
  • Must possess at least a Ph.D. in a related field.
  • Strong skills in verbal and written communication Programmes, including academic management, administration, and operation. Program development and review, assessment management, academic quality assurance, etc.
Other tasks given from the President, VC or DVC HEA from time-to time to meet the recent mission and vision.

Company Overview

Who are we?
Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
Your application will be redirected to them.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Kuala Lumpur.
